item.title: CVE-2022-45090|2024-08-03T14:01:31.531Z -- group%20arge%20energy%20and%20control%20systems -- smartpower%20web
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Group Arge Energy and Control Systems Smartpower Web allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Smartpower Web: before 23.01.01.
